title: David Jubenville Endowed Student Award Fund
description: To provide annual awards to graduate students in the College of Engineering at the University of Colorado Boulder who are pursuing careers in geotechnical engineering, in memory of David Jubenville.
marketingContent: This fund was established in memory of David Jubenville to promote his legacy of engineering achievement to support the intellectual curiosity of promising students who are pursuing studies in the field of geotechnical engineering. David Jubenville was a leader in the field, taught at the University, and was a consummate professional with a wonderful sense of humor.
